channel.title: Steve Veldman on Rotational Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Steve Veldman on Rotational Labs

item.title: AI and Learning Debt: How to Use AI to Make Yourself Smarter - Not Dumber
item.description: This is a post about how to use AI to make yourself smarter - not dumber.

item.title: Making Sense of LLMs
item.description: Now that we’ve covered agents at a high level and prompts specifically, let’s move to the next component in our series: Large Language Models (LLMs), a key subset of generative AI. In an agentic framework, LLMs serve as the “brain” or decision-execution component of the agent.

item.title: The Underappreciated Art of Capturing Novel Data
item.description: While the internet is an endless source of free data, everyone is training on the same tired datasets, and they’ve likely got more years of practice. Building a novel dataset tailored to your problem can be a game-changer (if done right).
